plot: Towards the end of their lives, two old friends discover that one of them was in love with the other one's wife for more than 30 years.
title: Mr. Halpern and Mr. Johnson
plot_es: Towards the end of their lives, two old friends discover that one of them was in love with the other one's wife for more than 30 years.
plot_en: Towards the end of their lives, two old friends discover that one of them was in love with the other one's wife for more than 30 years.
